diff_hunk:

 # To build with GPU support:
 $ bazel build -c opt --config=cuda //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package
 
-$ bazel-bin/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/build_pip_package /tmp/tensorflow_pkg

body: This is really strange. This is some deep setuptools arcana that needs someone more expert than me. I went through our build_pip_package and setup.py, nothing there seems like it should need to access installed protobuf.
